abstract.p: Two hundred forty-nine recently published monographs treat critical theory: specifically semiotics, narratology, rhetoric, and language systems; structuralism and deconstruction; feminism; psychoanalytic criticism; historical criticism; postmodernist criticism; reader-response criticism; and phenomenological criticism.
